ModMetaData.name: Extended Woodworking
ModMetaData.author: TeflonJim
ModMetaData.description:
This is an update of the Extended Woodworking mod (A13). All credit for the original creative work goes to ItchyFlea. https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=7893.0
Previous versions of this module can be downloaded from GitHub:
https://github.com/TeflonJim/ExtendedWoodworking/releases
This release supports RimWorld 1.0, 1.1, 1.2, 1.3, and 1.4.
This mod changes trees so that when they are cut down, they produce wood of that tree type. Different wood types have slightly different properties.
Wood may be painted in different colours. The available colours are: Red, Green, Blue, Yellow, White, Black.
A Woodworking table is available to paint wood or convert specific types of wood to the original wood type (generic wood).
Supported expansions:
* Royalty * Ideology * Biotech
Supported mods:
* [HRK] Gun Nut - Community Pack * [HRK] Gun Nut - Ruger Mini * [HRK] Gun Nut - Soviet SMGs * [HRK] Gun Nut - Winchester M97 "Trench Gun" * [LTS]Furnishing * [T] ExpandedCloth * [T] MoreFloors * A Dog Said... Animal Prosthetics * Alpha Memes * Area Rugs 2.0 * Camping Tent * Caravan Equipment * Caravan Gear * Ceramics VEF * Coal Expanded * Erin's Japanese Furniture * Fertile Fields [1.1] * Fortifications - Neolithic * Musical Instruments (Continued) * Pen's Decor * Project RimFactory - Materials * Project RimFactory Revived * Reclaim, Reuse, Recycle (Continued) * RoughBarricade (Continued) * Signs and Comments * Simple Learning * SRTS Expanded * Tabletop Trove - Additional Joy Objects and Decor * Vanilla Apparel Expanded — Accessories * Vanilla Books Expanded * Vanilla Brewing Expanded * Vanilla Cooking Expanded * Vanilla Cooking Expanded - Stews * Vanilla Factions Expanded - Classical * Vanilla Factions Expanded - Medieval * Vanilla Factions Expanded - Settlers * Vanilla Factions Expanded - Vikings * Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Architect * Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Props and Decor * Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Security * Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures * Vanilla Psycasts Expanded * Vanilla Weapons Expanded * Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Tribal * VGP Garden Tools * VGP Vegetable Garden
Cost lists, ingredient lists, and fuel lists are updated for each mod.
The following mods contain floors, the defs are duplicated for each available wood type. A drop down list is added to allow material selection:
* Evt Floors * [T] MoreFloors * [WD] Expanded Floors * GloomyFurniture * RIMkea
Incompatible mods:
* Expanded Woodworking * Simple Chains: Lumber
The original version of Extended Woodworking inspired a number of mods including the two listed above. It is not possible to create compatiblity patches for the mods above.
